word_mean: 又称“生活强度”。生物群落中，各种生物的生长发育兴衰程度。
生物体正常生长发育的能力。

sentence.Network_en: Contemporary African cinema has much to offer in its vitality and freshness.
sentence.Network_cn: 当代非洲电影在活力和新颖性上颇足称道。

sentence.Network_en: Without continued learning, graduates will lose their intellectual vitality.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果不继续学习，毕业生就会失去思想上的活力。

sentence.Network_en: He is a man of extraordinary vitality, driving ambition and political nous.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是一个精力非凡、志向远大、政治上很有见识的人。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 活力（vitality）(Vitality)：拥有强大的活力（vitality），不仅可以增加生命值，能够更频繁地做出动作，人物的攻击力和防御力也会有相应的提高。升级潜能(…
医学论文,常用生命质量测定量表简介 ... 总健康( General Health) 生命力( Vitality) 社会功能( Social Function).
体力（vitality）：提高生命上限，按比例提高防御值，提高格挡的几率。　　暴击伤害：把基础攻击或技能的伤害值按最大伤害值为基础…
德鲁伊_52PK单机游戏_PC.52PK.COM ... Dexterity( 敏捷度)：20 Vitality( 活力值)：25 Energy( 能量值)：20.

list.abs: 肺_百度百科 ... 肺腑[ the buttom of one's heart] 肺活量[ vital capacity] 肺结核[ pulmonary tuberculosis].
【摘要】:正活体染色(vital staining)一般是指用无毒或毒性很小的染料,在不影响细胞的正常生命活动的前提下而使活细胞的某些结构着色的一种实验方法。最早进行.
英语—医学 ... Endocrinology[ 内分泌系统] Vital Signs[ 生命体征] Bp[ 血压].
全国第六次“人口普查”-英语点津 ... vital index 出生死亡比例 vital statistics 人口统计 age-sex composition 年龄性别组成.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin vitalitas, from vitalis (see vital)

entry.def: If you say that someone or something has vitality, you mean that they have great energy and liveliness.

example.ex: Without continued learning, graduates will lose their intellectual vitality...
example.tran: 如果不继续学习，毕业生就会失去思想上的活力。

example.ex: Mr Li said China's reforms had brought vitality to its economy.
example.tran: 李先生说中国的改革给其经济注入了活力。

means.word_mean: 2. a healthy capacity for vigorous activity;

sentences.sentence: "he seemed full of vim and vigor"

means.word_mean: 3. (biology) a hypothetical force (not physical or chemical) once thought by Henri Bergson to cause the evolution and development of organisms
4. the property of being able to survive and grow;

auth_sentence.content: This leads to health and vitality in the body.
auth_sentence.res_content: This leads to health and vitality in the body.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This leads to health and vitality in the body.

auth_sentence.content: Their freshness and vitality can hardly fail to strike.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their freshness and vitality can hardly fail to strike.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their freshness and vitality can hardly fail to strike.

auth_sentence.content: They attested to his mischievous vitality and his self-possession.
auth_sentence.res_content: They attested to his mischievous vitality and his self-possession.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They attested to his mischievous vitality and his self-possession.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生死攸关的,重大的;有活力的;生命的,生机的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vit生命+al……的→adj.生死攸关的,重大的;有活力的;生命的,生机的
vital有活力的+ism学术流派→n.活机论, 生机说
vital[adj.生死攸关的,重大的;有活力的;生命的,生机的]+ity表名词→n.活力,生命力;生机,元气

stems_affixes.value_cn: 主要部件;[人体的]重要器官
stems_affixes.word_buile: vital有活力的+s→有活力的东西

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使复活,使重新充满活力

stems_affixes.word_buile: vital生命的,生机的+ize表动词→v.激发,赋予生命

Sentence.sentence: The rising numbers signify growing vitality in foreign markets – when we import more stuff, it puts more cash in the hands of people around the world, and U.S. exports are rising because more foreigners have the ability to buy the things we produce and market.

sentences.en: He came back from his holiday bursting with vitality and good health.
sentences.cn: 他度假归来之后，身强体壮，充满活力。

sentences.en: He is an ambitious young man full of enthusiasm and vitality.
sentences.cn: 他是个充满热情与活力的有远大抱负的青年。

means.word_mean: 生命力, 元气, 持久力

sentences.en: Hothouse plants do not possess exuberant vitality.
sentences.cn: 在温室里培养出来的东西,不会有强大的生命力。

sentences.en: It is hoped that the factory will add to the economic vitality of the region.
sentences.cn: 该工厂有望增强该地区的经济活力。
